CLEARANCE_ALREADY_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Clearance already granted. Proceed to docking bay {bay}.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_NO_BAYS.message: Clearance denied. There are no free docking bays.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.description: Shown if player requests docking too far away from station
CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.message: Clearance denied. Your ship is too far away for ID verification.

CLEARANCE_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Clearance granted. Proceed to docking bay {bay}.

DOCKING_CLEARANCE_EXPIRED.message: Docking clearance expired. If you wish to dock you must repeat your request.

STATION_GRAV.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

STATION_GRAV_PRESS.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

WATCH_FOR_TRAFFIC_ON_APPROACH.message: Please watch for traffic on your approach.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_1.message: {playerShipLabel} you are entering {station} space. Please follow local regulations.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_2.message: {playerShipLabel}, we have you on the radar. You are in {station} controlled space.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}, this is {station} STC. You are entering our controlled space.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_4.message: We have you flying into {station} controlled space, {playerShipLabel}.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}, welcome to {station}. Please keep in mind that regulations apply as you are flying through our jurisdiction.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}, this is {station} STC speaking. You are entering controlled space, and I would appreciate it if you didn't make me fill out any paperwork today.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_1.message: {playerShipLabel}, you are clear of {station} controlled space.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}, you have cleared {station} controlled space. Restrictions withdrawn.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_4.message: You are flying out of {station} space, {playerShipLabel}. Logging you out.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}, you are leaving {station} space. Have a pleasant journey.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}, this is {station} STC. I see you exiting our controlled space, be safe out there.
